title: 'Nothing has been the same since... time is not a healer' - grieving father of bonfire stab victim Lorcan O'Reilly
text: News Courts Monday 6 February 2017 'Nothing has been the same since... time is not a healer' - grieving father of bonfire stab victim Lorcan O'Reilly 'All of our hearts are broken... No parent should have to bury their child' Peter Doyle 0 Comments Share 'Nothing has been the same since... time is not a healer' - grieving father of bonfire stab victim Lorcan O'Reilly Independent.ie THE father of 21-year-old Lorcan O’Reilly, who was fatally stabbed in the heart by a 14-year-old boy at a bonfire party, said today no parent "should have to bury their child". http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/courts/nothing-has-been-the-same-since-time-is-not-a-healer-grieving-father-of-bonfire-stab-victim-lorcan-oreilly-35428199.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article34591755.ece/a9b6a/AUTOCROP/h342/Lorcan-oreilly.jpg Lorcan O'Reilly THE father of 21-year-old Lorcan O’Reilly, who was fatally stabbed in the heart by a 14-year-old boy at a bonfire party, said today no parent "should have to bury their child". Share 'Nothing has been the same since... time is not a healer' - grieving father of bonfire stab victim Lorcan O'Reilly Independent.ie THE father of 21-year-old Lorcan O’Reilly, who was fatally stabbed in the heart by a 14-year-old boy at a bonfire party, said today no parent "should have to bury their child". http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/courts/nothing-has-been-the-same-since-time-is-not-a-healer-grieving-father-of-bonfire-stab-victim-lorcan-oreilly-35428199.html
